Package it.polimi.ingsw.protocol.commands

Class Command

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.protocol.commands.Command
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreateMatchCommand, GetMatchesListCommand, JoinMatchCommand, PingCommand, QuitGameCommand, SetNameCommand
public abstract class Command extends Object implements Serializable
Commands are message used from the player before the match or to quit the game.

      public abstract void applyCommand(PlayerConnection connection) throws Exception

      connection - The player's connection used to apply the command.
